"As of version 1.3.16, files uploaded from this device are copied into the local %1$s folder to prevent data loss when a single file is synced with multiple accounts.
Due to this change, all files uploaded in previous versions of this app were copied into the %2$s folder. However, an error prevented the completion of this operation during account synchronization. You may either leave the file(s) as is and remove the link to %3$s, or move the file(s) into the %1$s folder and retain the link to %4$s.
Listed below are the local file(s), and the remote file(s) in %5$s they were linked to."
